text: Great historical movie. Great story. Keanu Reeves is a Saint.
The movie was really good the critics suck and are wrong.
Underrated by Rotten critics. This is a good movie. Incredible costumes, nice fights, nice portrayal of some Japanese ceremonies.

This is why real critics suck balls. 

I have no idea why people hated this movie when it came out. WHAT A BANGER. I put it on as background noise while I was working and I got zero work done. The only recommendation is that it should be in Japanese with subtitles. The fact that it is based on a true story is mind blowing, samurai history is so fascinating. What a group of absolute badass warriors!

Don't know why it is so negatively received, it is a fun movie with a good cast. Sure not the greatest film ever made but it's definitely entertaining. Story is descent, good action and a mix of magic and fun. If you haven't seen it definitely give it a watch.
It's your standard big budget Hollywood fantasy film but this time its set in Japan. If you haven't seen it you're not missing much.
47 Ronin (2013) could have been a great film but it is just a big disappointment. The central error is very weak, the beginning is the best part and then it just falls apart.

I really think this is a great movie even in 2025 even though a lot of it looks dated, the actors do a good job building suspense and the story is interesting to me and I would recommend if you need a good movie to sit back and watch without expecting 2025 quality.

I would definitely not say this is an academy award winning movie but if you go in looking for entertainment then this just might be enough to have some fun with I enjoyed this movie call me crazy but I find it fun
Started out well , but there is so little dialogue in this movie . It was just boring
A masterpiece that reunited Keanu Reeves and Hiroyuki Sanada. Fighting side by side, between fiction and honor, and making of this movie one of my favorites ever.

This movie is  such a great movie!!! I absolutely love it.  It has great actors, Hiroyuki Sanada and  Keanu Reeves in their first movie together! The acting, plot and scenery is awesome! It's a shame about the ratings. My family loved it so much that we bought it and revisit it yearly.

Not nearly as bad as critics made it out to be but still far from great, 47 Ronin is a fairly standard samurai-action-fantasy film that's slightly elevated thanks to gorgeous visuals, a stellar musical score and a scene-stealing performance from Hiroyuki Sanada.

Very boring fantasy added to a well known japanese story. Wooden acting. Incorrect history and rediculous costumes. Why is the shogun wearing a gold bucket on his head? Why is Keanu Reaves even in this movie?
Love, emotions, courage,  loyalty, adventure, action, u can find everything in this movie. Acting, direction, story everything is epic. One must give it a shot.
tại chị phù thủy keo quá nên t cho 2 sao chứ không là cho 0.5 sao rồi
Very entertaining, but boring and favorite, it has many bad points, the reviews are bad, and it's true
It was nauseating. I feel a small portion of my life was wasted. They're samurai, then they are not, then they kind of are, then not, but then they die a Samurai's death.  Yep.
Way better than any Marvel movie out nowadays.
Making a fantasy/horror movie of a fake legend with horrible acting and plot was a big mistake. Avoid at all costs.
